titles.title: A resolution commending the Children's Home Society of America.
A resolution commending the Children's Home Society of America.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Commends the staff and volunteers of the Children's Home Society of America for the dedication and commitment of the Children's Home Society of America to the children and families of the United States.
Recognizes the Society for leveraging human, financial, and material resources to carry out the mission of the Society of helping children and families to remain safe, healthy, and prepared for life.
Encourages the continued efforts of the staff of the Society on behalf of children and families.
